_header: This time is born a child full good
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Man be merie as bryd on berie / & al thi care let away’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Þis tyme is born a chyld ful goodHe þat vs bowt vpon the
                    rod…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…To worchepyn hym their knelyd on kneWith gold & myr &
                    francincens
